lore: Incapable of disloyalty and clad in forms as resilient and resplendent as their mastersâ€™, Lychguard are the ultimate protectors. Whether reaping the foe with warscythes or advancing with dispersion shields locked and hyperphase swords thrumming, at close quarters these bodyguards are nigh on unstoppable.
